title: Peach homemade ice cream
ingredients: ['1kg fresh peaches - peeled, stones removed and chopped', '100g caster sugar', '250ml double cream', '250ml full fat milk', '1 (397g) tin condensed full cream sweetened milk', '1 (410g) tin evaporated milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '500ml full fat milk, or as needed']
